name: Tyrone Krantz
summary: Executive profile: Over 5 years experience in the marijuana industry, managing and assisting in building up a marijuana business to a multi-million-dollar, multi-company operation. Solid management experience with strong knowledge in operations of Dispensary (Retail), OPC (Grow), and MIP (Manufacturing). CO State industry badge since 8/2011 (M03625).

experience.title: Professional Experience Consultant
experience.description: Independent industry operations consultant with private groups.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Managing operations for (MIP) manufacturing, production, grow; Hiring, scheduling, training employees; Processing company payroll; Assisting in setting up new (high end) Co2 extraction equipment; Operating, maintaining Co2 extraction equipment; Tracking and entering inventory in METRC; Collecting, processing, delivering test samples to lab; Wholesale orders and transfers of product to other facilities.

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Managing fast paced medical/recreational dispensary; Hiring, scheduling, training employees; Tracking inventory in MJFreeway and METRC, running audits; Inspecting and pricing products; Processing wholesale orders; METRC entry for transfers, wholesales, daily sales, packaging; Balancing cash drawers; Advertising campaigns for marketing products and sales, social media.

experience.title: Owner/ Holistic Healer
experience.description: Managing private practice working with patients one on one in a therapeutic environment using various modalities for pain management and healing.
